org.middleheaven.logging
Interface LoggingService

All Known Implementing Classes:
BroadcastLoggingService
@Service
public interface LoggingService

The Logging Service. This is a environment dependant service and is initialized and controlled by the environment.

Method Summary
 void addLogListener(LoggingEventListener listener)
          Add a LoggingEventListener that will receive future LoggingEvent events.
 void log(LoggingEvent event)
          Publish a new log event to be broadcast among registered LoggingEventListeners.
 void removeLogListener(LoggingEventListener listener)
          Remove a previously added LoggingEventListener.
 

Method Detail

log

void log(LoggingEvent event)
Publish a new log event to be broadcast among registered LoggingEventListeners.

Parameters:
event -

addLogListener

void addLogListener(LoggingEventListener listener)
Add a LoggingEventListener that will receive future LoggingEvent events.

Parameters:
listener - the listener to register.

removeLogListener

void removeLogListener(LoggingEventListener listener)
Remove a previously added LoggingEventListener. If the listeners was not previous register nothing the method does nothing.

Parameters:
listener - the listener to remove from the register.
